mapper.select: SELECT p.`prod_cls_code` as prod_cls_code FROM `prod_cls` p WHERE 1=1 AND p.`prod_cls_code`=#{prodClsCode}
select `prod_cls_code` from `prod_cls` where 1=1 and instr(prod_cls_code,#{prodClsCode})>0

unit_wgt = #{unitWgt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

unit_wd = #{unitWd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
unit_ht = #{unitHt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where prod_cls_id = #{prodClsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
,
from prod_cls ${tableNameAliase} where 1=1
and ${tableNameAliase}. `prod_status` != 'D'
AND `prod_status` != 'D'
and ${sql}

SELECT c.`prod_cls_id` as prodClsId, c.`prod_cls_code` as prodClsCode FROM prod_cls c WHERE c.`ctrl_unit_id`=#{unitId} /*shared 为空查询组织所有持有商品，不为空查询共享商品*/
AND c.`shared`='T'
and c.`prod_status`!='D'

SELECT pc.prod_cls_id AS prodClsId, pc.prod_cls_code AS prodClsCode, pc.prod_name AS prodName, pc.input_code AS inputCode, pc.prod_status AS prodStatus FROM unit_prod_cls upc INNER JOIN prod_cls pc ON pc.prod_cls_id = upc.prod_cls_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT y.brand_id AS brand_id FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT u.brand_id AS brand_id FROM user_brand u WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND u.owner_id = #{sUnitId} AND u.is_del = 1 UNION SELECT DISTINCT d.brand_id AS brand_id FROM user_bg u INNER JOIN bg_dtl d ON u.bg_id = d.bg_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND u.owner_id = #{sUnitId} AND u.is_del = 1 ) y INNER JOIN brand a ON y.brand_id = a.`brand_id` AND a.brand_status = 'A' ) userP ON userP.brand_id = pc.brand_id LEFT JOIN color c ON c.color_id = pc.color_id AND c.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN spec s ON s.spec_id = pc.spec_id AND s.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN sys_code_dtl scd ON scd.`code` = pc.edition AND scd.code_type = 'EDITION' LEFT JOIN sys_code_dtl scd1 ON scd1.`code` = pc.uom AND scd1.code_type = 'UOM' WHERE pc.isAudit = 1 AND pc.auditType = 'am' AND pc.prod_status != 'D' AND upc.unit_id = #{sUnitId} AND pc.prod_cls_code = #{prodClsCode} AND pc.prod_status = 'A'
SELECT c.prod_cls_id as prodClsId FROM product g INNER JOIN prod_cls c ON g.prod_cls_id = c.prod_cls_id INNER JOIN `wareh_stk` s ON s.`prod_id` = g.`prod_id` WHERE c.`prod_cls_id` = #{prodClsId}

select p.`prod_line` as warehouseCode, s.`unit_code` as ownerCode, p.`season` as seasonCode, p.`brand_id` as brandCode, c.`prod_code` as barCode, b.`brandCode` as `brandCode`, b.`brand_name` as brandName, p.`prod_name` as itemName, c.`prod_id` as itemId, c.`prod_code` as itemCode, l.`color_name` as color, p.`lst_price` as purchasePrice, p.`unit_wd` as grossWeight, c.prod_cls_id as prodClsId from prod_cls p inner join product c on p.`prod_cls_id` = c.`prod_cls_id` inner join sys_unit s on p.`ctrl_unit_id` = s.`unit_id` inner join brand b on b.`brand_id` = p.`brand_id` inner join color l on l.`color_id` = c.`color_id` where p.`prod_cls_id` = #{prodClsId}

SELECT p.`prod_cls_id` AS prodClsId, c.`prod_id` AS prodId, c.`prod_code` AS prodCode, c.`prod_cls_id` AS prodClsIds FROM prod_cls p INNER JOIN product c ON p.`prod_cls_id` = c.`prod_cls_id` where p.`prod_cls_id` = #{prodClsId}
